lines.text: [the Misfits have been hang gliding and passing out promotional fliers]
She must be testing my new laser.

[frightened]
You let Pizzazz loose... WITH A LASER?
Why do you always think the worst of me?
Your father hoped you'd be strong.
But I suppose tough is good enough.
[the misfits are eating after Kimber has been attacked by a shark]
This food is delicious! What is it?
Well, I figured since the Holograms were having shark...
[Clash disguises herself as a film student filming a documentary on Jem and the Holograms]
Wow. Even at five in the morning she looks amazing.
[Pizzaz slams the door and plaster falls from Eric's office ceiling on to his head.]
